quote: Miss Benson had the power; which some people have, of carrying her wishes through to fulfillment; her will was strong, her sense was excellent, and people yielded to her â€“ they did not know why.
quote_letters: MISS BENSON HAD THE POWER WHICH SOME PEOPLE HAVE OF CARRYING HER WISHES THROUGH TO FULFILLMENT HER WILL WAS STRONG HER SENSE WAS EXCELLENT AND PEOPLE YIELDED TO HER - THEY DID NOT KNOW WHY
